page.text: Wounded and weakened, you find yourself on the ground in front of the enormous insect. Its legs pinning your own down as it lifts you up by your armpits with its claws. As it open its mouth and you see the brutal inward curved fangs on each part of its 4 piece jaws, you shudder. No getting out of that once you're in.

You can't bring yourself to fight anymore, too weak to escape the jaws approaching your face. You watch as it slides over your head and feel a sharp pain as the fangs find purchase in your shoulders. Slowly it pulls you deeper into its dark purple gullet.

The monster rapidly sets about swallowing the rest of your body now that it has passed the shoulders. It's only a good few seconds before you're more than halfway encased in a large fleshy sack that you assume is its stomach. On the outside, the creatures gut hangs down and bulges, pieces of its carapace spread out to cover as much of its stomach as possible.

Your second wind comes not a moment too soon, and to great effect. You take your
and slam it into one of the creatures eyes with all the force you can muster. Clearly it was enough, as the creature recoils swiping at the air. That hasn't gotten rid of it, and it might just be madder now. You should probably leave.

gameover.text:
Your second wind comes not a moment too soon, your head already in the bug beasts mouth. You take your
and slam it into one of the creatures eyes with all the force you can muster. This turns out to be a bad idea as its jaws slam shut upon your head, crushing through your skull and tearing up your brain. The grief somehow looks almost disappointed that you died so soon, but continues eating anyway. No longer bothering to keep your body intact it starts eating you in chunks instead, not even taking the time to lift its legs off of your own and instead simply ripping them from their place on your body. In the end all that's left of you is the red pool on the ground where you where devoured, and a pair of legs that were quickly scavenged by formic.

and slam it into one of the creatures eyes with all the force you can muster. Your efforts are futile, as the creature simply clenches its jaws tighter around your head. Now you can't even squirm or its fangs will pierce into your throat. You simply have to wait as the insect drags your body further and further into its waiting gullet.

gameover.text: The creature quickly stuff in the rest of your body, its maw closing silently behind your feet which pass into the gut with the rest of you. You feel your confines shake about rapidly as the insect speeds off with its odd gait to find even more victims. It isn't long before the shaking stops, and you hear an inhuman screech get cut short, followed by chunks of formic being shoved into your already somewhat tight prison. You can feel the acids leaking into the griefs stomach and rapidly eating away at both its new contents and your own body, you black out as you feel yourself give way to the insects rapid metabolism. Its stomach would be flat again within minutes.
